General.Name: Tait Marketing & Distribution Co Ltd
General.Description: Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. imports and trades in consumer goods in Taiwan. It offers tea, coffee, mineral water, beer, wine, liquor, and other beverages; desserts; and sugar cake/snack food products. The company also exports its products. Tait Marketing & Distribution Co., Ltd. was founded in 1845 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
